distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for re2c fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2018-21232: Fixed excess stack consumption due to uncontrolled recursion in find_fixed_tags (bsc#1170890).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: re2c before 2.0 has uncontrolled recursion that causes stack consumption in find_fixed_tags.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
